name: Starmie
author: Keiji Kinebuchi
flavor_text: This Pokémon has a geometric body. Because of its body, the locals suspect that it is an alien creature.

abilities.name: Space Beacon
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t choose a card you discarded with the effect of this Ability.)

attacks.name: Star Freeze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
